nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`)

nodes.bodyText: what is "driver Property" ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)

nodes.bodyText: "Throw a user error when session property value cannot be decoded." ?

@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)

+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`)

+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)

+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* presto-cli now accepts queries passed via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)

nodes.bodyText:
So is it Hive or general change? Or both?
I guess "both" in terms that parsing logic/analysis needed to be added Presto-wide. But given fact that we have only Hive implementation should we add bullet point to "General" section? In what way changes to the Presto core are user visible?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* presto-cli now accepts queries passed via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)
+
+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)

nodes.bodyText: It's both. There's an item in the General section, as well.

+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Allow configuring HDFS replication factor through property `hive.dfs.replication`. ({issue}`1829`)
+* Add access checks for tables in Hive Procedures. ({issue}`1489`)

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* presto-cli now accepts queries passed via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)
+
+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Allow configuring HDFS replication factor through property `hive.dfs.replication`. ({issue}`1829`)
+* Add access checks for tables in Hive Procedures. ({issue}`1489`)
+* Decrease latency of insert and CTAS queries by updating table and column statistics parallelly. ({issue}`3638`)

+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Add support for configuring subnet based network topology for topology-aware scheduling. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* presto-cli now accepts queries passed via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)
+
+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Allow configuring HDFS replication factor through property `hive.dfs.replication`. ({issue}`1829`)
+* Add access checks for tables in Hive Procedures. ({issue}`1489`)
+* Decrease latency of insert and CTAS queries by updating table and column statistics parallelly. ({issue}`3638`)
+* Fix leaking S3 connections when querying Avro tables. ({issue}`5562`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Add dynamic filtering support for Kudu. It can be enabled using ``kudu.dynamic-filtering.wait-timeout``
+  config property or ``dynamic_filtering_wait_timeout`` session property ({issue}`5594`)
+
+## MongoDB Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries containing a `LIMIT` clause. ({issue}`5870`)
+
+## SPI Changes
+
+* Add support for table scan redirections. ({issue}`5792`)

nodes.bodyText:
Maybe rephase:
Allow to disable client HTTP results compression, which can improve throughput over fast network links.
Compression can be disabled in CLI using the `--disable-compression` flag.
In JDBC driver it can be disabled using the `disableCompression` driver property.

nodes.bodyText:
Maybe  "Add support for INTERSECT ALL and EXCEPT ALL"
This way it's easier to understand and more "searchable" too
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+# Release 347 (XX Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax to allow changing the view owner. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `ALL` qualifier for `INTERSECT` and `EXCEPT`. ({issue}`2152`)

nodes.bodyText: Yes, but that's not entirely accurate. The language feature is EXCEPT and INTERSECT, which we already support. ALL and DISTINCT are just capabilities of those features.

nodes.bodyText: @martint i see your point. I am trying to make this easier to understand while not incorrect. INTERSECT ALL did not work, so it seems fair to say we're adding support for it. up to you

+* Improve result throughput over fast network links by making http response compression configurable. Clients
+  can disable compressed responses using the `--disable-compression` flag or `disableCompression` driver property.
+  Compression can be disabled server-wide with `query-results.compression-enabled=false`. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error for failing to decode a session property value. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* presto-cli now accepts queries passed via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)
+
+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Allow configuring HDFS replication factor through property `hive.dfs.replication`. ({issue}`1829`)
+* Add access checks for tables in Hive Procedures. ({issue}`1489`)

nodes.bodyText:
It is. As far as I know, it has two parts:

Add support in the SPI
Enforce access control checks within Hive connector procedures

nodes.bodyText:
Optional suggestion: Add dynamic filtering support should be enough as this is already in Kudu section.
The property seems to be a Duration, and the feature is enabled by "setting a non-zero value" for the property. Current sentence structure makes it sound like it's a boolean to me.
Add dynamic filtering support. It can be enabled by setting a non-zero duration value for ``kudu.dynamic-filtering.wait-timeout`` config property or ``dynamic_filtering_wait_timeout`` session property.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+# Release 347 (25 Nov 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add `ALTER VIEW ... SET AUTHORIZATION` syntax for changing owner of the view. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Add support for `INTERSECT ALL` and `EXCEPT ALL`. ({issue}`2152`)
+* Add {func}`contains_sequence` function. ({issue}`5593`)
+* Support defining cluster topology (used for query scheduling) using network subnets. ({issue}`4862`) 
+* Improve query performance by reducing worker to worker communication overhead. ({issue}`5905`, {issue}`5949`)
+* Allow disabling client HTTP response compression, which can improve throughput over fast network links.
+  Compression can be disabled globally via the `query-results.compression-enabled` config property, for CLI via 
+  the `--disable-compression` flag, and for the JDBC driver via the `disableCompression` driver property. ({issue}`5818`)
+* Rename ``rewrite-filtering-semi-join-to-inner-join`` session property to ``rewrite_filtering_semi_join_to_inner_join``. ({issue}`5954`)
+* Throw a user error when session property value cannot be decoded. ({issue}`5731`)
+* Fix query failure when expressions that produce values of type `row` are used in a `VALUES` clause. ({issue}`3398`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for multiple LDAP bind patterns. ({issue}`5874`)
+* Include groups for view owner when checking permissions for views. ({issue}`5945`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `addBatch()`, `clearBatch()` and `executeBatch()` methods in `PreparedStatement`. ({issue}`5507`)
+
+## CLI Changes
+
+* Add support for providing queries to presto-cli via shell redirection. ({issue}`5881`)
+
+## Docker Image Changes
+
+* Update Presto docker image to use Centos 8 as the base image. ({issue}`5920`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `ALTER VIEW  ... SET AUTHORIZATION` SQL syntax to change the view owner. This supports Presto and Hive views. ({issue}`5789`)
+* Allow configuring HDFS replication factor via the `hive.dfs.replication` config property. ({issue}`1829`)
+* Add access checks for tables in Hive Procedures. ({issue}`1489`)
+* Decrease latency of `INSERT` and `CREATE TABLE AS ...` queries by updating table and column statistics in parallel. ({issue}`3638`)
+* Fix leaking S3 connections when querying Avro tables. ({issue}`5562`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Add dynamic filtering support for Kudu. It can be enabled using ``kudu.dynamic-filtering.wait-timeout``
